name: Ascent (itch) (Robby Beattie)
description:
The world has fallen into chaos and instability, and you've traced this madness to its source: the Tower of Magic. Ascend, brave one, and restore order to the world!

Controls:

Left Arrow (A): Move Left

Right Arrow (D): Move Right

Space: Jump

Created by University of Vermont Game Development Club

 Marcus Elia - Programmer & Musician 

 Tyler Hickey - Visual Artist & Animator 

 Tim Martin - Level Design

 Robby Beattie - Programmer & Manager

 Dylan Gooley - Idea Man
